predict_diagnosis:
1. Spinal Muscular Atrophy (SMA)
2. Hereditary Spastic Paraplegia (HSP)
3. Neurofibromatosis (NF1)
4. Charcot-Marie-Tooth Disease (CMT)
5. Spinal Cord Injury (SCI)
6. Friedreich Ataxia (FA)
7. Metabolic Myopathy
8. Inflammatory Myopathy (e.g., polymyositis, dermatomyositis)
9. Infectious Myelitis (e.g., transverse myelitis, Guillain-Barré Syndrome)
10. Degenerative Spinal Disease (e.g., cervical spondylosis, lumbar spinal stenosis)
